scripts.build-job-portal-dev: npx rimraf dist && node --max_old_space_size=8000 ./node_modules/@angular/cli/bin/ng build --configuration development
scripts.publish-job-portal-dev: npm run build-job-portal-dev && npx wrangler pages deploy ./dist/job-portal-app/browser --project-name job-portal-dev
scripts.build-job-portal-prod: npx rimraf dist && node --max_old_space_size=8000 ./node_modules/@angular/cli/bin/ng build --configuration production
scripts.publish-job-portal-prod: npm run build-job-portal-prod && npx wrangler pages deploy ./dist/job-portal-app/browser --project-name job-portal-prod
